title: 1v2 champs
body:
hey with bard the roaming suport id think it might be cool if there was a champ that specializes in 1v2 laning 

they could give him some ridiclouse sustain or a verry long range poke wich does to litle damage to herass but is good for last hitting 
maybe make him so that having a level advantage would really help him out allot 

if id belaning 1v2 now id pick something like heimi if id wanted to keep my tower alive or maybe zed, nidalee or azir for the long range 
id gues it has to be balanced in some way that he wouldnt be op in a 2v2 lane 
aa simple reaction to playing against this champ could be letting your suport go to the mid lane or roam aswel
but it might bring some more different tactics in the game

replies.body:
I feel like the idea of having a 2v1 champ would be good but im not sure how to really get it balanced has to be a way where putting him in a 1v1 / 2v2 lane would not make him ridiclousely lane rapjng

Yet have no problem competing with 2players during laning fase

i was thinking of maybe making him so that he could ignore damage/cc from 1 champ while 2 attack him

but im not sure if this would really help cause this way the suport wil just zone you out while.adc gets cs

or maybe give him a shield wich makes him unable to take and deal damage to champs/buffs 
But be able to atack minions for x amount of time
but that just kind of lame
This is actually a really neat idea!  I'd love to work on a concept like this in a few days.
